constituent: ooze, water, water droplets, water pistol, invariably, heart, stick, drop, fishhook, drop3
koohiiStory1: Anything full of water will invariably begin to ooze.
koohiiStory2: When you pierce a heart with a stake, it invariably oozes blood.
myStory: nước chất. nước chảy qua khe. nước chắc chắn.
words: 泌み泌み(しみじみ): keenly, deeply, heartily
